text: 9:15 Akar Mogomem 8:7-12Ezɨ a 4plan enselɨn kaba ataki, eghtɨ me 3plan okoruabar gumazamiziba tuiragham, egh okoruatam bar a mɨsueghtɨ a arɨmɨghiregham. God faragha ghaze, auan kam ko aruer kam ko iakɨnir kam ko azenir kamɨn enselɨn kaba ingangarir kam damuam. Ezɨ enselɨn kaba kalabusɨn ikia uari akɨrigha ingangarir kam damuasavɨra dughiar kam mɨzua iti.
